header.title: Methods for classes generated from Schema
header.meta: xmlbeans,xmlbeans port to C++, XML, XML Schema, code generator, XML Manipulation, xmlbeansc, xmlbeans++ xmlbeansc++, xmlbeansxx, xmlbeanscxx

body.note: xmlbeansxx was inspired by Apache XMLBeans (developed by The Apache XML Project). Generated API is strongly based on generated methods in XMLBeans.
